messages.rationale: Detailed bug report with issue reference

messages.text: JWT token expiring after 5 mins instead of 24h - affects all mobile clients, p0 issue
messages.label: signal

messages.text: API response time degraded to 2.5s (was 200ms) after yesterday's deploy, investigating db indices
messages.label: signal

messages.text: need to add pagination to /topics endpoint - currently returns 50k items causing memory spike
messages.label: signal

messages.text: should we migrate from sqlalchemy to drizzle orm? faster query builder, better ts support
messages.label: signal

messages.text: websocket reconnection logic failing - loses 10-15% of messages when network switches, needs retry buffer
messages.label: signal

messages.text: postgres vacuum running at peak hours - causing lock contention on topics table, move to 2am
messages.label: signal

messages.text: want to implement request signing middleware for webhooks - prevent replay attacks
messages.label: signal

messages.text: cache invalidation issue - atoms showing stale data after update, ttl not respected
messages.label: signal

messages.text: frontend bundle size increased from 180kb to 420kb after new chart library, should we optimize
messages.label: signal

messages.text: consider async message processing - currently blocking requests while extracting knowledge
messages.label: signal

messages.text: uuid collision in test suite - using same seed for all tests, need randomization
messages.label: signal

messages.text: rate limiting broken - bot exceeds telegram limits, queued 2000+ requests
messages.label: signal

messages.text: environment variable validation missing - api started with invalid db url, silent fail
messages.label: signal

messages.text: proposal: implement event sourcing for audit trail - better for compliance requirements
messages.label: signal

messages.text: typecheck errors in vector search module - 47 type issues blocking ci
messages.label: signal

messages.text: nats connection pool exhausted under load - connections not returning, memory leak
messages.label: signal

messages.text: suggested adding circuit breaker for external api calls - currently fails hard on timeout
messages.label: signal

messages.text: vector embedding cache hit rate only 12% - embedding same topics repeatedly, waste of tokens
messages.label: signal

messages.label: signal

messages.text: decimal rounding issue in importance scorer - 0.499 treated as 0.5 causing category mismatch
messages.label: signal

messages.text: recommend implementing opentelemetry tracing - hard to debug request paths across services
messages.label: signal
